name: PepsiCo, Inc.
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. is one of the world’s largest food and beverage companies, known for its diverse portfolio of brands including Pepsi, Lay’s, Gatorade, Doritos, and Quaker. Headquartered in Purchase, New York, PepsiCo operates globally and employs over 319,000 people. The company is publicly traded on the Nasdaq under the ticker PEP and consistently ranks among the top Fortune 500 firms.
